(as of Nov 30,2022 11:40:58 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Curated with Care

Clean and composed lines, modern design, and a strong focus on quality are the foundations Juvale is built on.

Wooden Block Calendar

These cute farmhouse calendar blocks feature dates that can be updated each morning. The interchangeable wooden calendar can be used at home or in businesses. Plus, the rustic date blocks make an excellent gift for teacher appreciation or to help students stay organized.

Dimension: 5W x 4H in

Rustic Calendar Blocks

Our wooden perpetual calendar includes 2 numbered wooden cubes and 3 monthly blocks in a vintage-looking storage container.

Farmhouse Desk Accessories

This office desk calendar can also be displayed on your mantel, living room table, home, bookshelves, dorm room, classroom, or kitchen counter.

Month + Day

Keep track of the date when at home, school, medical practice, restaurant, or boutique counter.

Modern Solutions

Uncomplicate your home with our affordable, stylish, and long-lasting, home décor, kitchen and entertaining accessories.

Thoughtful Design

Each homeware collection combines contemporary aesthetics with the quality and minimalism of European and Scandinavian design.

Size
5W x 4H in 4.5L x 2.5W x 5.8H in 6W x 16H in

Material
Wood Wood Tin

Wooden Perpetual Calendar: This perpetual calendar includes numbered wooden cubes and monthly blocks in a vintage-looking storage container to help you keep track of the date
Great for Any Occasion: The cute decorative calendar blocks are perfect for teacher desk decor, school and classroom shelves, office supplies, medical practices, coffee shops, and restaurants
Easy to Use: The individual day and month date blocks for desk can be easily changed to reflect the current date or holiday
Dimensions: The block calendar for desk set measures 5.3 x 3.7 x 2.6 inches; each numbered cube measures 2.3 x 2.3 inches; each of the 3 month-printed blocks measure 4.7 x 0.8 inches
Comes With: You will receive 2 numbered wooden cubes and 3 monthly blocks in a vintage-style storage container to add to your farmhouse office decor

item.title: LAKOWN [2022 New] Fast Sling Puck Game, Wooden Hockey Game, Desktop Battle Paced Winner Board Games Toys, Funny Slingshot Game for Adults and Kids, Parent-Child Interaction Chess Toy Board Table Game
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) MEDIUM SIZE SET: Fast sling puck game is a game that both children and adults can play. Medium size table game toy is more for children over 6 years old. The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:29:18 UTC – Details)



MEDIUM SIZE SET: Fast sling puck game is a game that both children and adults can play. Medium size table game toy is more for children over 6 years old. The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach the opponent’s area, and you are the winner if you hit all the chess pieces first. (SIZE: 14*9*1.2 in)
DEVELOP CHILDREN’S ABILITIES: Sling puck game is a fast-paced game. It can improve children’s concentration, hand-eye coordination and rapid response ability in fast and concentrated hits, and can keep children away from video games temporarily. This slingshot game toy can also enhance a child’s sense of competition.
HIGH QUALITY SOLID WOODEN: Wooden hockey table game toy use high-quality solid wood frames to make chess pieces and chessboards, which are durable and smooth. The surface is smooth and will not hurt the player’s hands. It can also make the chess pieces slide more smoothly. The chessboard adopts professional tenon and tenon structure can make it stronger.
FAMILY FUN OR PARTY GAME: As a desktop battle board game toy pursuing speed, it is suitable for colleague dinners, friends gathering, family entertainment, can promote colleague relations, enhance parent-child interaction which is an active atmosphere toy. Let us enjoy a relaxing leisure time with family and friends!
IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS & ADULTS: Wooden sling hockey board game is a toy for all ages. Table game toy is made of wood, adhering to the concept of environmental protection and recyclability, without batteries. It can be used as a child’s birthday gift or as a holiday gift. Package includes: 1 chess board, 10 chess pieces, Christmas special edition box!

4.5
Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:29:18 UTC – Details)

item.title: OLA ART Shut The Box Game Wooden for 2-6 Players, Wooden Board Table Math Game with 16 Dice, Board Game for Kids Adults, Family Classroom Home Party or Pub
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)



What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, it is one of the most popular math games
Origin of The Game: The history of this game is not much more than vague folklore — No one really knows when and where the game originated. It may have originated in Normandy, France around the 12th Century. It is believed to have been a popular game amongst fur trappers of the Hudson Bay Company in the 19th Century. It is said to have also been popular among sailors and fishermen. This centuries old game is great for teaching kids basic addition and subtraction. It helps to build mental math skills and is really fun to play
Endless Fun for Every Occasion：This classic pub game is a great addition to any game night of holiday get-together! Gather your friends and family around this addicting dice game, and put your math and strategy skills to the test. Whether you make some friendly wagers or just play for fun, Shut the Box is sure to entertain
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Premium Felt ensure the lower noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game and hours of fun while playing
Multiple Ways to Play: There are different ways of playing Shut the Box. Read the instructions or you find and learn about options online by searching “How to Play Shut the Box” or “Shut the Box Game Variations”.

4.5
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)

Manufacturer WOOD CITY

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $35.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:55 UTC – Details)

From the brand

WOOD CITY Shut the Box Game

Shut the Box Game for Party, Family

About us

WOOD CITY aims to provide high-quality wooden early learning intelligence toys for all young children, by researching early childhood development, growth, practice.

We strive to achieve a collective vision of providing the best and up-to-date educational wooden toys for all young children, and commit to ensuring that they thrive and learn in a community where they reach their full potential and develop their intellect and imagination.

Shut the Box for 6 Players

Shut the Box for 4 Players

Fast Sling Puck Game

Upgraded Version for 6 Players: This shut the box game set designed for up to 6 players includes hexagonal game board lined with felt and completed with 1-10 numbers, instructions, 16 dice (12 colored, 4 original wood color). Kids and adults can enjoy the deal of strategy and luck and hours of fun while playing.
Learning While Playing: Simple math are required to play the shut-the-box dice game. Kids could improve basic mathematical addition skills, exercise logical thinking, problem solving abilities and enhance interpersonal communication and build good relationships with their friends. With gift box package design, this shut the box game set is a perfect gift for kids.
Blast Quick Game: No more time for a complicated game? Choose our wooden shut the box game. You can play a game for as long or as short a time as is available with 6 People. You can also customized rules to play more round.
Portable Traditional Game for Different Occasions: This 6-way close the box dice game is a portable and easy to carry wooden board game. It can be play in many different occasions, perfect for family, classroom, parties, pub etc. to have a great time with your family members, friends, classmates.
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Felt surface pad could reduce the noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game. If you have any issues with our shut the box game, do not hesitate to get in touch with us and we will be more than happy to ensure you have a satisfying buying experience.

SHUT THE BOX GAME WOODEN for 6 PLAYERS

  • Shut the Box is a particular dice game, our upgraded version can be played up to 6 players.
  • The history of the game could be over 250 years and originated in Normandy.
  • In pubs, Shut the Box is traditionally played as a gambling game, but we don’t advocate it generally.
  • Nowadays, it becomes a more and more popular board game during family activities, parties, and festivals.
  • Either for social and family entertainment or as an excellent tool for kids to learn math calculations.
  • The player rolls the dice, adds up the numbers, and then puts down the pieces that have the sum.
  • Enjoy the luck of the game as well as exercising the ability of divergent thinking to find more combinations.

PERFECT TABLETOP GAME

  • Whether it’s a game at a party to liven things up, or a bar gambling to punish the loser for drinking.
  • It can be both considered as our first choice of tool.
  • Portable, and can play with several friends at the same time to increase the play ability.
  • Not only are there various play rules, but also can through personal luck to create thrilling moments.




Shut the Box Wooden Game for 4 Players
Car Ramp Toy for Toddler
Toddler Fine Motor Skills Toys, Bee to Hive Matching Game
Battery Operated Train for Wooden Train Set
Wooden Train Set, Battery Operated Trains & Wooden Train Tracks
Gift Collection Popular Board Game Ramp Racer Toys for 2 Year Old and up Wooden Color Sorting Toy for Toddler 2 3 Years Old Electric Trains for Wooden Train Set Toy Train Gift for Train Lovers

Product Description

Esur Home Office Desk Black Decor – Inspirational Farmhouse Wooden Box Sign Gifts

The sign reads “everything is figureoutable” and is a reminder to think positively! Keep your thoughts positive and be encouraging in your workplace or workspace.

This box sign measures 8 x 4 inches and is made of solid wood MDF, Simple, classic design durable and lightweight with a hollowed out back sanded for a distressed look.

Crafted modern farmhouse office decor, adds warmth and gives it a vintage look that adds to a country or rustic home decor theme, A great reminder and additional to any desk, shelf, or any decor aesthetic.

Makes a Great Gift – The stylish and inspirational box sign makes unusual gift for almost any occasion for your friends or family, co-workers and more.

100% purchase guaranteed, if you are not completely satisfied,please feel free to contact and we will solve your problem at our first priority.

Inspirational Office Supplies Sign – “Everything is Figureoutable” everyone gets a kick out of this when they see it at your desk, one simple belief can help us overcome any obstacle and create unstoppable success
Great Piece of Desk Art – Sign measures 8 x 4 inches and 1.5 inch deep, thick enough to freely stand on its own or hang on a wall, perfect for desk accessory or put on shelf
Decorative Wood Sign – Simple classic design, durable and lightweight with a hollowed out back, edges and corners sanded for a distressed look. Made of MDF with quality premium printing
Desk Decor Accessories – Cute office decor piece for men or women, inspirational farmhouse decor, cubicle wall art. Good reminder for those daily challenges, and the bigger things that come along too
Perfect Gift Idea – Great gift for collegues, workmates, schoolmates, friends, family and more. It looks cute and is perfect for a smaller workspace to add a personal touch to the decor

For automatic enthusiasts, a dual wheel is a must have for their collection. Automatic watches are extremely accurate as they barely lose 3 seconds per day. so you don’t have to miss another meeting or appointment.

No Battery Needed

Self-winding Sea-Gull movement powers vibrant silver hands for ultra-accurate, battery free time keeping.

Natural Red Sandalwood and Ebony

Made of Natural Red Sandalwood and Ebony. All wood is hand sanded and polished to a smooth, durable finish. Only 82g, Lightweight and Comfortable

Read more

Unique Design

These watches are unique, not simply calling for attention.Our wood watches for men are the trendy investment pieces you’ve long been waiting for.

Natural Wooden Band

Our hand-selected, premium hardwoods do not deteriorate or become brittle due to every day wear. Size can be adjusted by adding or removing links with tool, or by local jeweler

Bracelet Clasp

Dual locking deployment buckle and reinforced clasp secure adjustable wood bracelet (removable metal pins secure links together).

Perfect Gift

It is an ideal gift for birthday, anniversary, Christmas, Father’s Day and Valentine’s Day.

Read more

  • 1 X BOBO BIRD Round Bamboo Gift Box
  • 1 X Remove Link Tool

Product Description

How to play the fast sling puck game?

Each player has five pucks on their side. Now, who’s going to go first to make a move? You can decide this on your own or flip a coin to decide. The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.

Perfect Gift

A great game makes a great gift. The sling puck game can be a perfect gift for Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas. The neat size of the game is portable and can be taken along with to bar, camping, etc.

Package Specification: 1 x Box 1 x Puck board 10 x Pucks

Sling Puck Game

Sling puck is a fast-paced game where two players compete by firing pucks to the opponents’ side. The first player with no pucks on his side wins. During the exciting game night, the sling puck game helps you unwind after work.

Premium Solid Wood

The chunky pucks made of solid wood are sturdy and well-crafted. With burr-free wood enhances smooth touch while playing. The Coogam sling puck game will soothe your daily stress and make for laughter.

Lighten Your Tension

While it’s a two-player game, it can be even funnier when playing with families and friends watching on the side. They will cheer for their favorite player as if they were watching a real competitive game; scream gladly for the winner.

Premium Solid Wood: High-quality sling puck board games are made of sturdy wood, long-lasting material that is thick and firm for multiple plays. The two puck firing strings are made of strong and durable elastic.
Eye-catching Design: Exquisitely made bright pucks contrast an attractive grass football field presents visual impact to your kids. Sharpen your child’s focus while gaining quicker responses in this fast-paced game. A pretty engaging board game that will keep them play for hours away from electronics.
Family Fun Time: This is a great board game for parents-kids to bond over. The Coogam sling puck board game offers an opportunity to develop social skills and intelligence. Kids get to improve their relationships with parents and friends while having a lot of fun out of it.
Soothe Your Anxiety: Without complicated rules, the sling puck board gameplay simply by ejecting the pucks through to the other side, a perfect game for hand-eye coordination practice as well as relaxation.
Screen-Free Activity: Still struggling to find the balance between digital and real-life connections? Coogam sling puck board game provides a screen-free quality time for kids and family, as a gift for boys and girls, or to have fun at parties.

Each player has five pucks on their side. Now, who’s going to go first to make a move? You can decide this on your own or flip a coin to decide. The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.

Perfect Gift

A great game makes a great gift. The sling puck game can be a perfect gift for Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas. The neat size of the game is portable and can be taken along with to bar, camping, etc.

Product Description

Purifying the air and good for health

XXXFLOWER is committed to the design and production of DIY decorations for garden, home, office, kitchen and bathroom. The design style is retro and charming, adding a simple and classic feel to your living space.

Perfect Combination

Natural wood has a unique textures, light but firm, high transparent borosilicate glass is smooth without scratches,allowing you to observe the growth of plants more clearly. Great for growing houseplants and can purify indoor air and good for health

More Stable Design

The metal swivel holder passes through the glass bulb, which is convenient to change the water and not easy to knock over.Propagates your plant’s babies in style, slim glass container provides plenty of room for plant’s roots and all are visible for observing its growth condition.

Best Patio Decoration

Hydroponic plant propagator can beautify and purify your room and office, it will create fresh green atmosphere and make you feel relaxed.The cute plant terrarium propagator with high-quality is great for flower arrangement, window sill, office decoration.

Super Stability and Smooth

High-quality mosaic structure, beautiful, smooth and not rough, thickened glass, no easy to break

Planter Tips

Retro wooden plant propagation station glass for Desktop , perfect for growing plants houseplants, for example water plants or fern.

You can use your imagination to your heart’s content with the plants you like.

For example:

Green dillGeraniumMintVine plantBaby’s breathRoseTulip

Best Gift for Plant lover

Best gifts for women plant lovers – Mother’s Day, birthday, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving gift ideas. Nice present to your nature-loving, gardeners. Sweet wedding party, anniversary, and special occasions decoration gifts. Make a great gift for the plant-lover in your life.
